Interfaces

IConfigurationCollection

A configuration collection represents a single file of configuration. One file can have one single serializer for every section, and multiple filename for the configuration collection.

The enumeration is guaranteed to enumerate in the order in which the section properties were described.

IConfigurationCollection<T>

A configuration collection represents a single file of configuration. One file can have one single serializer for every section, and multiple filename for the configuration collection.

The enumeration is guaranteed to enumerate in the order in which the section properties were described.

IConfigurationCollectionDescriptor

Describes a configuration collection.

IConfigurationOptionDescriptor

Describes a configuration option.

IConfigurationProperty

Represents a property in a configuration section

IConfigurationSection

Represents a serializable section in a configuration

IConfigurationSection<T>

Represents a serializable section in a configuration

IConfigurationSectionDescriptor

Describes a configuration section

IConfigurationTypeMapper

Maps types to a correct string value that can be interpreted by the emulator configuration. Convention requires that there be a default converver for Enum types implemented by default

IConfigurationValue

Represents a unique configuration value.

IConfigurationValueCollection

Represents a enumerable collection of configuration values.

ISelectionOptionDescriptor

An option descriptor for options with type Selection Describes the available options by introspecting the backing EnumType.

Enums

ConfigurationOptionType

The types of configuration options.

PathType

The type of the configuration path if isPath is true.
